attributes.action: Petition to ignore the ECHR ruling on Abu Qatada and deport him immediately.
attributes.additional_details: In issues that affect public protection and dispensation of justice it is only right that British Courts that adhere most stringently to Human Rights decide the fate of those who are under their jurisdiction. Abu Qatada and like minded people who flout British and European justice with leniency must face appropriate sanctions and not hide behind human rights that they themselves have forfeited.
